title: Bounding Box
description: A bounding box for indicating where a specific object is located on a given image

x1.description: The starting x coordinate, expressed as a decimal fraction of the image's total width

y1.description: The starting y coordinate, expressed as a decimal fraction of the image's total height

x2.description: The ending x coordinate, expressed as a decimal fraction of the image's total width

y2.description: The ending y coordinate, expressed as a decimal fraction of the image's total height
